column9:
Thank you for your email. I am currently on Annual Leave until 16th August 2010.

For urgent matters relating to your existing function booking or for any new enquiries. please contact our friendly reception team who would be pleased to assist you in my absence.

Adelaide Royal Coach - Phone 08 8362 5676. Email royalcoach@countryclubs.com.au

Adelaide Meridien Hotel & Apartments - Phone 08 8267 3033. Email meridien@countryclubs.com.au

All other emails will be actioned upon my return to the office. Thanks for your patience.

Kind Regards.

Felicity Martin
Functions Coordinator
Adelaide Royal Coach & Adelaide Meridien Hotel & Apartments
